name: Engineering and Law
description: Upon graduating university and entering the workforce, engineering students have little idea about how frequently in their professional lives their interactions, decisions, and actions will touch on various areas of law. This course is designed to highlight the amount of overlap between these two pillars in today’s society. From acting as an expert witness, to preparing a patent, to creating a contract for supplies and beyond. By the end of this course, studentswill have a working understanding of the intersection between Engineering and Law, and be able to navigate themselves in that area.
